product_name: Madshus Snowpup Cross-Country Skis with Bindings - Kids'
long_description: When your kids are ready to make tracks of their own, the durable Madshus Snowpup cross-country skis will get them gliding. Extra-wide profile offers a stable platform on which to build confidence and develop balance. Short length and gentle sidecut combine for easy sliding. Premounted with convenient universal bindings that easily accommodate almost any winter boots. Tough polyurethane construction offers maximum durability. Waxless base provides uphill grip. Madshus Snowpup cross-country skis are recommended for children up to 55 lbs.
short_description: When your kids are ready to make tracks of their own, the durable Madshus Snowpup cross-country skis will get them gliding.
